item.description:
Although we're not sommeliers, we do enjoy a good bottle of wine! And thus is the inspiration for this MeetUp.

Everyone who comes should bring a bottle of their favorite wine (or two!). We're planning on serving hot hors d'oeuvres, not a large sit down meal. Although we're planning on providing the food, if you have a particular pairing that goes well with the wine you're bringing, feel free to bring the food as well!

If you're going to RSVP, please also answer the questions, especially what wine you'll be bringing as well as the food allergies. FYI for those allergic - we have no pets, but a tenant on the 3rd floor has a Beagle. We don't think it would present a problem as he's never in our house.

Address will be provided to those that RSVP prior to the meetup date.
item.how_to_find_us: Call the number listed on the meetup.
item.name: Wine Tasting Potluck
